name: @dxc-technology/halstack-angular
description: DXC Angular CDK (Component Development Kit) based on Graphen Design System

scripts.post-build-lib: cp -R ./src/assets ./../../dist/dxc-ngx-cdk/lib/assets && npm run copy-styles-lib && npm run copy-md-lib
scripts.generate-lib: npm run build-lib && npm run post-build-lib && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-prod: npm run build-lib-prod && npm run post-build-lib && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-win: npm run build-lib && npm run post-build-lib-win && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-prod-win: npm run build-lib-prod && npm run post-build-lib-win && npm run package
scripts.test-forms: npm run test dxc-toggleGroup.component.spec.ts dxc-new-textarea.component.spec.ts dxc-textarea.component.spec.ts dxc-switch.component.spec.ts dxc-slider.component.spec.ts dxc-select.component.spec.ts dxc-radio.component.spec.ts dxc-new-date.component.spec.ts dxc-input-text.component.spec.ts dxc-date.component.spec.ts dxc-number.component.spec.ts dxc-password.component.spec.ts dxc-new-input-text.component.spec.ts dxc-new-date.component.spec.ts dxc-button.component.spec.ts dxc-checkbox.component.spec.ts
scripts.test-navigations: npm run test dxc-footer.component.spec.ts dxc-header.component.spec.ts dxc-tabs.component.spec.ts dxc-wizard.component.spec.ts
scripts.test-layout: npm run test dxc-card.component.spec.ts dxc-sidenav.component.spec.ts dxc-tabbed-section.component.spec.ts dxc-tag.component.spec.ts
scripts.test-utilities: npm run test dxc-upload.component.spec.ts dxc-spinner.component.spec.ts table.spec.ts dxc-table.component.spec.ts dxc-progressbar.component.spec.ts dxc-paginator.component.spec.ts dxc-link.component.spec.ts dxc-heading.component.spec.ts dxc-dropdown.component.spec.ts dxc-dialog.component.spec.ts dxc-accordion.component.spec.ts dxc-accordionGroup.component.spec.ts dxc-alert.component.spec.ts dxc-chip.component.spec.ts
scripts.test-all: npm run test-forms && npm run test-navigations && npm run test-layout && npm run test-utilities
